website_summaries.verdict: Heavy-duty slicker brush that is super easy to clean.
pros: Works for long and short hair dogs
Slightly different design than other self-cleaning brushes makes it less likely the tines will get stuck behind the self-cleaning guard
One press button for brush cleaning
Allows you to gently brush without getting stuck on your dog's hair
cons: Self-cleaning feature makes this brush bulkier than others on the market

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product For a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This thing is worth every penny. My cat loves being brushed more than any cat ever but this brush takes the cake. my cat is a severe shedder. You couldn't pet him without coming back with a handful of hair. he felt greasy and dirty and you could feel small mats in his undercoat and after 30 minutes with this brush he felt like a whole new cat. Now it's not too much different than a regular slicker brush but the ability to easily clean it makes the difference for me simply because he is impatient and if you take too long to clear the brush he'll get bored and walk away. Works very well definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Stein

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and minimal cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I will never use any other brush! This is excellent as brushing my Shiba's undercoat. I love how easy it is to clean with the click of a button and gets the job done quickly and easily. My shiba does not seem to mind it too much and I am never disappointed with the job it does. Brushing and cleaning has never been so easy and my puppy loves it! If you are not already using this brush, then you are working WAYYY too hard! Do yourself a favor! Best brush on the market for a great price and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Codyk

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush !!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brush. If I brush kitty first with a different brush and then use this brush, it keeps removing even more hair !! Kitty tolerates it well. I wish they made one half as wide to fit to reach his narrower areas . But great brush !! Thanks !!
customer_reviews.author: J. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my Cairn Terrier, who has wiry top coat and a thick soft undercoat, and hates the heat. She weighs 16 lbs and this brush is a decent size for her, but could be a tad smaller to be honest. It works as advertised, making clean up after a breeze. It gathers a good amount of loose undercoat hairs every time I use it. I've had it for about 4-6 weeks and so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Tweety Bird

customer_reviews.title: Manual non self cleaning is better
customer_reviews.text: I've had it a year now and hardly use it; not a go to brush. The self cleaning feature is nifty but makes the brush head bulky; it is difficult to maneuver into tight spaces and curved areas of my cavalier king charles Spaniels. It's also rattle and not very stable during brushing. I have a smaller simpler cheaper slicker brush that does the job much better, I can control motion & angles better with it, stable & easy to use. One swipe with a comb and the brush hair is out of my manual brush. Regret the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Flamingo39

customer_reviews.title: I guess my dog is sensitive
customer_reviews.text: My dog's groomer recommended I purchase a slicker brush for my (papillon) dog. He HATES this brush. When I placed my hand against the bristles, I understand why. The tips of the bristles are quite sharp/pokey. He RUNS when he sees me pick up this brush. So despite others having luck with this slicker brush, I will be donating mine to the local SPCA. At least he likes my old Mason Pearson brush. Unfortunately, it's not as easy to clean the hair out of as this brush.
customer_reviews.author: PVKat

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great-Now Does Not
customer_reviews.text: Great for my cat! My dogs hate it because it hurts them! I bought it for my dogs so I'm going to have to purchase another one but I'll definitely get a different brand this time. Since I wrote this review (which I have hardly used it) and have had this for just over a month now the botton will not extract. I'm changing the rating from 5 stars to 2 stars because for almost $16.00 you would have thought it would work longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: A very nice brush.
customer_reviews.text: I have never seen a brush that cleared the hair as effectively as this one. Does a nice combing out job and then you can push the hair out completely. Truly self cleaning. It was slightly too large for my pup and I was bumping a few places on him around the legs, so he complained. Being a rescue dog, he was supersensitive to this kind of touch. I decided to go with a smaller slicker brush and gave this one to my sister who was VERY pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Best Slicker Brush I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down, the best Slicker Brush I've ever used! I've had dogs my whole life and have generally done all the grooming involved myself. After my last slicker brush handle broke off, I decided to try this one and I will never go back! It does a fantastic job and is self-cleaning with the click of a button.
customer_reviews.author: sbr78

customer_reviews.title: Size does matter
customer_reviews.text: It absolutely works without a sore thumb from holding the button. Click and the slicker is down for brushing. Click again and the bristles pop inside so hair and fur just wipe away. To me they run on the small side. I got a medium brush for a 45 pound long hair. It's only 2" X4". The medium brush seems too small for a medium dog . Go larger.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Brush!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this brush for grooming our Maine Coon cat, Special Agent Jack Meower, who is prone to serious matting if he's not brushed regularly. The tools we were using previously were not doing the trick, and since Jack has had abdominal surgery that narrowed his intestine, hairballs became a serious health issue for him. After doing all of my online research, I found this brush which was consistently rated one of the best. It works beautifully! It is gentle yet very effective in helping to remove mats and for de-shedding. Grooming sessions have become a much more pleasant experience. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: mamalazer

customer_reviews.title: Good tool to smooth coat
customer_reviews.text: This product works ok, but not the go-to grooming item. My long haired Dachshund (she has a really heavy coat) is less tolerant of this brush than other brushes I have. I do like the retractable tines — it makes for easier cleaning, but more importantly, it protects the tines from being bent or caught on other items stored in the same drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Puppy1

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: I have been pleasantly surprised by this dog brush. I have a Havanese and recently decided to keep her coat longer. She had previously been in a puppy cut. I was not looking forward to the brushing issues associated with a more full coated dog but this brush has been great. Don’t get me wrong, my dog is not thrilled with the process but is much more relaxed and even closes her eyes while I brush her.
customer_reviews.author: Gailz

customer_reviews.title: Great Self Cleaning Slicker Brush!
customer_reviews.text: I can honestly say that this slicker brush is just fabulous. I have had many brushes over the years and find this brush to be so comfortable to use and easy to clean. I have a golden retriever with extremely fine flyaway fur. The convenience and ease for quickly removing the fur from the brush to continuing brushing, makes the brushing experience enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great everyday slicker brush! I use it for my Shiba Inu puppy, who is currently going through a shedding phase. It cleans out her fur nicely after walks, and I love the self-cleaning feature - makes this brush so easy to use. Some dogs might be spooked by the click of the button when you turn it on and off, so be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Easy & effective
customer_reviews.text: I like this brush a lot and my dog LOVES it. He sees me get the brush and happily hops onto my lap so he can be brushed. While he’s chill during the brushing, afterwards he’s rejuvenated and excited! I appreciate how easy this is to clean and my furniture does too.
customer_reviews.author: T. C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: After using this for a while now, it is very easy to use. Only problem I'd the bristles. If I press to hard the bristles hurt them. Is it because they're (bristles) to long? Because of the bend of the bristles? The tips were not polished after they were cut to prevent scratches? I don't know. So any matting I come across I still have to use something else and that's why I only gave 4 stars (3 1/2)
customer_reviews.author: T. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great brush!
customer_reviews.text: I have a labradoodle who does not like to be brushed since most brushes pull her coat. This is the best brush that I have found so far that can both comb through her coat and she's not bothered by it. The bristles are metal, but I guess they are gentle enough that they don't hurt her. I love the self cleaning part of it---no trying to dig out the fur after you are done brushing. Just push a button, and your brush is clean! I definitely recommend this brush.
customer_reviews.author: jt_ndc

customer_reviews.title: Probably works fine for longer hair dogs
customer_reviews.text: About a quarter of the teeth were bent on arrival despite it being in "cleaning" mode with the teeth retracted. Additionally it didn't seem to work at all on our short haired American Staffordshire Terrier. I mean at all. I could see loose hair on her and this didn't pick them up or even push them around. Probably works better on longer hair dogs but for now I'll stick to my Furminator.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M. Bruening

customer_reviews.title: Jack the Cat doesn't mind this at all even though ...
customer_reviews.text: Jack the Cat doesn't mind this at all even though he is a short haired cat. Scarlett won't let me come anywhere near her with it. She much prefers some old palm held plastic brush I have had for years. This one is small enough for a cat and you just push the button in to hide the bristles, wipe it clean, and put it away. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cat J

customer_reviews.title: BEST I’ve used for long-haired Goldens!
customer_reviews.text: Hands-down, the best brush I have ever used for our golden retrievers! THE HAIR of these “pups” can be overwhelming. This brush is so incredibly easy to use - and sturdy too! No tines have broken and the handle is both sturdy and comfortable. I just used it again on them so I thought I’d share how excellent this product is!
customer_reviews.author: NoVA Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great grooming tool!
customer_reviews.text: Do not know how I managed before I had this. I need to groom my two long hair shaggy dogs daily. This brush and a comb from the same company make my job SO much easier. Great, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Great brush at least I thought it was
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loved it because it is so easy to clean until the cleaning button mechanism broke. Expensive for something that breaks that quickly. Unfortunately, I couldn't return it as it broke right at the return expiration date. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Slobecheski

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for shedders
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it kept scratching my dogs skin and she hated it no matter how careful I tried to be. I liked that the loose hair was caught when we push the button. But I have a Mini Schnauzer which doesn't shed and it didn't work for me for the second reason. I would recommend for dogs that have hair that sheds.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: The utility design is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is fantastic! I love the pin gauge and that they hold up well, so my dog gets a good itchin' scratched and belly brushes regularly now. The brush thoroughly fluffs his curly fur, though naturally the fluff will curl back up within a day unless I use the brush with a blow dryer after his bath to give him a sort of pup blowout, hah. Anyhow, he loves his brush sessions so much, and this is the first brush of his I've bought that I actually liked. The utility design of it is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: gla

customer_reviews.title: Not for My Boxer
customer_reviews.text: If you have a short hair dog like my Boxer, this is not going to help deshedding or combing your dog. It didn't do much on collecting hair any better than my bare hand, and it annoyed my dog so much that I ended up returning it. On the other side, it might do a good job on a shaggy dog, I have to stay the quality of the product is great, it's just no good for the breed that I have.
customer_reviews.author: Horse Rider

customer_reviews.title: Beggar Lice and Burrs Gone!
customer_reviews.text: The slicker brush worked to solve my biggest problem. We live on a farm and my portugese water dog always returned from runs covered with beggar lice and burrs. The Pro Quality Self Cleaning Slicker Brush is the only product that has worked to keep my pup's coat clean. Product arrived quickly and am satisfied overall with service and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela D Tate

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is one great brush! SO easy to clean and use... never clogs! Do wish they made one with straight nylon bristles, too :)
customer_reviews.author: Kengrove

customer_reviews.title: Brush works great on my thick haired pup
customer_reviews.text: Brush works as expected. We have a very thick haired furry friend who is a bit squeamish, but the brush helps speed up pulling the excess hair out of the bristles. It’s the slow return to brushing that causes dogs to get bored, and try to leave. I like the Friendly emails ( with good grammar) with grooming advice.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: the lab mix seems to enjoy being brushed with this
customer_reviews.text: i've used it a couple times with our two dogs (both mutts - one a lab mix with a typical lab coat and one with a much softer, fluffier, and more prone to shedding coat). the lab mix seems to enjoy being brushed with this, the other is tolerating it but she is very old and never really liked being brushed. it cleans up well and it's gentle enough on the dogs that i'm happy to let the kids brush them. it doesn't seem to get to the undercoats very well, though. overall, happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: Easy Peasy way to brush my grooming-reluctant rescue dog. He's come to enjoy the Pet Portal brush, and so have I. He enjoys it because it doesn't hurt him and he actually seems to enjoy being brushed with it. I like it because of the self-cleaning feature, which operates with the touch of a button, releasing the hair right into the trash. What's not to love about this brush?
customer_reviews.author: Snorkeloki

customer_reviews.title: Her hair is super thick and very curly
customer_reviews.text: Even my Bichon, Tootsie, loves this new brush. Her hair is super thick and very curly. I brush and comb it everyday just like I do my own. She lays in my lap enjoying every minutes. The old brush I used didn't make her very happy...so now she looks forward to getting her hair brushed. Great purchase, I love pushing the button and removing the hair. Piece of cake easy. If you've every taken care of a Bichon's coat you know there is a lot of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: The reviews for the brush were very good; that's why I chose it to purchase
customer_reviews.text: The reviews for the brush were very good; that's why I chose it to purchase. After using it for a while, I find that it is difficult to brush my small dog with it. That doesn't mean that it would be difficult for anyone else. Just for me and my dog. I would probably purchase something smaller.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Desert Dweller

customer_reviews.title: Best brush ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this brush. It works really well on both my dog and cat. My favorite thing though is how it cleans with the push of a button. The bristles retract into the handle and the hair falls off making cleaning it a snap. I highly recommend. I have a Pomsky (Husky Pomeranian mix) and it works great on her heavy coat.
customer_reviews.author: Kristan D

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning the hair off with the retractable brush heads is super easy too
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this brush, this is the first time he has ever laid there and not struggled while brushing him. Cleaning the hair off with the retractable brush heads is super easy too. The only thing keeping it from five stars is I've noticed some of the brush pins are bent down and I have to keep trying to pull them back in line with the others. Definitely no reason not to buy this brush though, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matt D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I have three Yorkie mix dogs, one a yorkiepoo with the poodle coat. All beg to be brushed with this product and I love the self clean feature.
customer_reviews.author: PMCVICAR

customer_reviews.title: Not just for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats, but I bought this item mainly for the long-haired Maine coon. She is constantly getting matted under her chin, where she can't reach and this brush takes care of that ( as long as she gets plenty of treats during the brushing ) it is also very easy to clean the hair out of this brush!
customer_reviews.author: flipper511

customer_reviews.title: Shih tzu Mom
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best slicker brush I have ever used. When you have 4 dogs to groom, it's important to have great tools. I love the fact I can push a button and the hair slides right off. I thing I have notice is that the hair becomes full of static - take a dryer sheet and rub over the brush before you begin and the hair will not cling to your hand or brush. I will definetly tell my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Shih Tzu Mom

customer_reviews.title: Effective Slicker For Cats
customer_reviews.text: Well made and effective slicker brush that works very well on cats. I keep a small towel nearby on which I wipe off the head after I retract the pins. Allows me to keep one hand on the cat and use the other for brushing.
customer_reviews.author: Hank B

customer_reviews.title: Works well. High recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Price is fair. We have four dogs: a golden-chow, a pom-pappillion, a corgi-husky and a Vietnamese ridgeback. Works well on all of them. Helps control the doggie fur bunnies that was floating through our house. Geat buy. Thanks Amazon shoppers for your reviews!
customer_reviews.author: j L

customer_reviews.title: great for tangles but just a little harsh
customer_reviews.text: Great for getting tangles and mats out of my shih tzu's longer hair. It's just a little harsh on his sensitive underside and behind his ears - I have to be really careful or I'll actually hurt him.
customer_reviews.author: Vlo

customer_reviews.title: Brush broke after 6 mths of use
customer_reviews.text: We loved the product at first and it was rec'd by our groomer for our golden doodle (very curly fur) yet it won't close and half of the wire bristles bent or broke off.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for at least a year on my persian and it works great
customer_reviews.author: K. Provence

customer_reviews.title: Great brush ... too bad my cats hate it
customer_reviews.text: This brush works well to remove undercoat and it's nice that you can press a button and retract the brissels. I used it on my two cats and a long haired bunny. Cats really disliked it for some reason. Bunny didn't mind, but her hair is so fine that it stuck to the plastic rather than coming off the brush easily. I'll get a video and attach it later.
customer_reviews.author: Shel_103

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Best slicker brush I’ve owned. Cleaning is easy, but really appreciate the brush for the quality grooming. So many others are just surface tools. This really helps with detangling and smooth coat.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Junk! Don't Waste Your Money!
customer_reviews.text: Within a matter of months, after only being used weekly, the self cleaning button broke inside the brush - pretty much rendered it useless! In order to use the brush you had to hold the button down to keep the brush pins exposed. There are a lot better, less expensive alternatives available.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey H. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for my mixed breed
customer_reviews.text: My lab/border mix sheds and sheds a lot. I've used many brushes over the years but this one, so far anyway, is my new favorite. Had great luck with customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Brush
customer_reviews.text: Great features, light not heavy, hairs come off Immediately with a swipe. The plastic could be just a bit better material. However, the brush works very well. I use the brush on my cats that have long hair but for the short ones doesn't work at all. Hope this is helpful for those who have long hair pets.
customer_reviews.author: cannoli13

customer_reviews.title: This thing worked great on our "fluffy" Welsh Corgi puppy
customer_reviews.text: Don't typically respond and the only benefit I am getting from this is giving you my opinion. This thing worked great on our "fluffy" Welsh Corgi puppy. Tried some other brushes and combs and figured it would be a 1-2 week ordeal doing our first brushing. We were done, needing only two days and our puppy looks great.
customer_reviews.author: All Lives Matter

customer_reviews.title: superb design
customer_reviews.text: Heard about this one in a dog park. Really good for long haired dogs with heavy undercoat. German Shepards, Labradors... love the self cleaning button that protects teeth as well.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bukowski

customer_reviews.title: Button won't eject bristles - worthless
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and out of the packaging the button mechanism won't eject the bristles. It's as if the bristles won't fit through the cuts/openings. I've taken this thing apart and put it back together a couple of times and no success. I can't believe I paid $20+ for this item. It's cheap! I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina B

customer_reviews.title: Easy hair release
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Easy hair release, no need to dig it out like on the last one I had, while sneezing profusely due to my dander allergy, even tho I still love kitty. Feels heavy duty, like it may actually last a long time. Your beloved cat will thank you for buying this! (if you speak Cat).
customer_reviews.author: Mod_Max

customer_reviews.title: Love this dog brush!
customer_reviews.text: Love the comfort & the easy removal of dog hair!
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: schnauzer didn't like it, to hard
customer_reviews.text: I have a schnauzer and it's very hard for him, I think that I am hurting him every time I use this brush, so metals are very stiff and I guess they do the purpose but I know that at some part if they touch their skin, they don't like it. I know, only for hair, but I didn't work as expected. I throw it away to the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Mario N.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this. I wish I would have gotten it ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this. I wish I would have gotten it right away. We have a very curly golden doodle. It has started to bend and show wear/tear. However, we used it pretty much daily.
customer_reviews.author: James & Gala Gardiner

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: It is a great design. Love how easy it is to keep clean. But I considered returning it as two of the bristles bent with the first pass through my puppy's hair. She is a Coton, a fluffy puppy that I groom several times a week. Other wise it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Suz M H

customer_reviews.title: Brissells of brush
customer_reviews.text: Brissells are strong & metal like which needed to take off shedding hair just be careful and not push to hard because it gets to their undercoat (skin) and it may hurt them - well at least it did to my 14 year old 22lb girl - but she needs or i need all this hair GONE!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeAnna Prinz

customer_reviews.title: Good grooming instrument
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brush to remove all the loose fur on the top coat of your pup! It also removes deeper coat, but I use a different brush for it. Something more aggressive (I am very particular when it comes to grooming) I love the fact that is retractable, and so easy to clean. You won't regret buying this brush!!!
customer_reviews.author: prii

customer_reviews.title: New Puppy Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: We just got a new puppy. Been many years since there has been a puppy in our house. I found the Slicker , it works great. The pup is a smooth chow chow and it is so easy to keep the brush clean. I will probably have to order the bigger one eventually as she only weighs 15 pounds now. But we like it , and more importantly, our new puppy enjoys being brushed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean. Dog doesn't object.
customer_reviews.text: This slicker brush is terrific. Very easy to clean. Dog seems comfortable being brushed. At first the dog was suspicious. I let her sniff it and mouth it. Once she succeeded to grab it and played 'keep away'. I started with just a few strokes at a time. Now she lies comfortably chewing her bone while I brush. I got the small brush for my 50lb Lab puppy. That was large enough and still left it easy to maneuver around her contours.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Dog Brush
customer_reviews.text: I have two inside dogs. A small coon hound and small dashound. Abby,, coon hound filled the brush full. I had to empty and start over. They both have dry skin and she loved it. Did not want me to stop. Toby hair is short so got just a small amount. Just click button and clean brush. Love it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy N. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for dog's hair
customer_reviews.text: We have four English labs and they have thick, heavy coats. This is frankly the best tool i've found to remove shedding hair. And easy to clean. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ruppaloha

customer_reviews.title: Retractable brush is genius!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is brilliant! It makes grooming my dogs very easy and they love the way it feels. Retractable bristles are genius! Highly recommend this brush. Use on two large breed dogs and works great.
customer_reviews.author: PenUser

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We have a soft coated wheaten terrier and it works beautifully. They don’t shed but they can get matted quickly but this brush takes all the knots out. So easy to clean, too, push the button and poof hair is ready to dispose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best brush in my grooming arsenal!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this brush - and so does my dog! It leaves his coat looking sleek, shiny and healthy! He’s fallen asleep more times than I can count, and I’ve only had it for 10 days. Absolutely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimbles

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for your curly dogs. Easy to clean, still somewhat of a struggle to brush out matted hair
customer_reviews.author: Claire turner

customer_reviews.title: Best product and I like gloves gets the undercoat.
customer_reviews.text: Works great on our 🐕! Gets at the undercoat and really gets the fur.
customer_reviews.author: Byron

customer_reviews.title: and are happy with both widths
customer_reviews.text: We have multiple cats in our home. We try to make brushing them a daily activity. We purchased two different sizes, and are happy with both widths. Most of our cats love to be brushed. We also have cats that tend to run, once they see the brush in our hand. The best testimony, for your purrrfectly wonderful brush, would come of course from the cats. Those of them that once shied away from grooming, now wait in line with the rest of them for their turn. They give your product a thumbs-up. WELL DONE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This brush is made very well good quality and cleans easily!
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Best dog brush
customer_reviews.text: It is great, it is easy to clean and easy to use...my dog actually enjoys the brushing....
customer_reviews.author: Richard Allen

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush is the best I've ever used in over 30 years of dog owning! My cocker spaniel loves it too. Goes right thru her coat so smoothly. The self-cleaning feature works well & makes cleaning the brush so easy. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Patty C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Slicker Brush
customer_reviews.text: This is a good slicker brush. It seems well constructed and the retractable feature makes it very easu to keep clean. I do find the ends of the bristles are on the sharp side. Much more than expected. I'll have to be very careful not to scratch my dogs when I brush them.
customer_reviews.author: JDW

customer_reviews.title: Great brush! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brush! I use it together with the furminator. The 2 are perfect for keeping my dog well groomed! Its great how you can brush, then push a button and the hair is ready to be tossed, and start brushing again! I will buy it over again if anything happens to this.
customer_reviews.author: claremaryanne

customer_reviews.title: Self-cleaning design makes it totally worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The self-cleaning design of this slicker brush makes it totally worth the price. In the past it was a real pain to constantly dislodge pet hair for the slicker tines.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Nice grooming tool for Cocker Spaniel
customer_reviews.text: Good tool for grooming my cocker spaniel. I think she has sensitive skin so I go "lightly" on her body, and carefully on her fluffy, cottony legs - it does a great job but I try to be careful not to hurt her legs by going too firmly.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Blount

customer_reviews.title: Great brush!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a mini labradoole and this works great on his coat. I love how it retracts the comb back so it's super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: C.L

customer_reviews.title: Nice and handy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tool. It's super easy to use and for my dog's coat exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn K. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great brush!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is so much easier to use. It works really well and is super easy to clear the fur off. I would definitely recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love the Way it Cleans Itself
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, when you close it with the touch of the button, it leaves the hair to easily remove.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for my husband's new guide dog
customer_reviews.text: Great brush for my husband's new guide dog! He is blind and and has to do all of the dog care himself. He is able to use this brush easily without vision! I am happy because there is a lot less doggie hair around too. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Locke, PhD

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Brush
customer_reviews.text: This is the first brush that my poodle likes and it fluffs him up as the dog groomer does. Best brush !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DONNA

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work good on my labrador mix
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work good on my labrador mix, they are shedding their winter coat and it's a mess!! thought this one could help, but their hair is too thin and short for it to grab it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Soco A.

customer_reviews.title: Seems perfect
customer_reviews.text: Awesome brush. Perfect angle and so easy to clean. Our dog loves to be stroked with it. Makes a great gift for new dog owners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very good quality pet brush.
customer_reviews.text: One of the better brushs for our 8 shih-tzu's. The retractable brush head makes cleaning the brushed dog hair from the brush very easy. It's comfortable and works better than most others we have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Paul

customer_reviews.title: works well and it is easy to clean the hair off of it when you ...
customer_reviews.text: works well and it is easy to clean the hair off of it when you push the button to retract the tines. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great beush
customer_reviews.text: Great brush... I use it twice a day on my doodle puppy- he doesn’t mind and always feels fluffy 😊
customer_reviews.author: Tonib

customer_reviews.title: Too big for small dogs, but great for medium and larger
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our YorkiePoo but it's just too large for her. The brush does work well and I can see how it would be great for larger dogs. So, I will pass this on to my son for his Schnauzer.
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY L NORRBOM

customer_reviews.title: Great for the right kind of coat
customer_reviews.text: My miniature poodle mixes have very sensitive skin and don't seem to like the teeth on this. The hair removal system on this (retractable pins) is brilliant however. For the right dog with a think coat I think this would be wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Tembrock

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use on my borzoi
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use on my borzoi. The breen has very sensitive skin and she tolerates this. Also easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: My dogs didn't like it but...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs didn't really like this, they prefer soft needles. They would freak out every time I pulled it out. However, the brush is very easy to clean. Great item if your dog like the standard slicker brush.
customer_reviews.author: Koala

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Brush is very nice and the best part is th as t it ejects all the hair. The handle is very comfortable. My puppy would rather chew on it than be brushed but she is learning and looks so nice when brushing finished.
customer_reviews.author: Charlooote

customer_reviews.title: Did an excellent job but only lasted six months.
customer_reviews.text: Did an excellent job but it only lasted six months. The button will not stay in, can’t afford to replace every couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great dog brush
customer_reviews.text: Love the ability to retract the brush bristles for cleaning the brush. So easy! My dog loves being brushed and now I have a quick way to clean the brush. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Easy on my dog and me!
customer_reviews.text: My Bernese mountain dog loves this brush and I do too. Easy to use and gentle on his coat. The button makes it easy to get the hair out of the brush. The product shipped quick and got here on time.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Brandegee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Captures hair well without being harsh on my cat. Easy to clean. However this is a large brush. I probably wouldn't order again for my cat ( 5 years old and grown) because it is too large. For dogs and larger animals I'm sure this is the perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: This slicker brush works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: This slicker brush works like a dream. Laddie has lots of thick fur. When he sheds, I brush him very frequently, but it has been difficult to get his undercoat. Now I can tell immediately that I am helping remove that undercoat. I like the retract button. It removes the hair from the pins quickly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: peppermintp.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Helps remove loose fur from cat's coat. Retracting the 'teeth' makes it very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kakurenbo

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on her Skin
customer_reviews.text: My dog, whose a goldendoodle likes this brush. It doesn't pull her hair and gets the mats out. I also think it is more sensitive on her skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: No so much
customer_reviews.text: I like item but my dog hates it. It hurts her
customer_reviews.author: Diana Blatt

customer_reviews.title: Good brush
customer_reviews.text: Better than most. We have a Shith Tzu and a mixed breed with very thick double coat. They are both not crazy about being brushed , but like this brush better than anything else. The very thin brush works to help remove clumps.
customer_reviews.author: jcs

product_meta.title: Pro Quality Self Cleaning Slicker Brush for Dogs and Cats - Easy to Clean Pet Grooming Brush Removes Mats, Tangles, and Loose Hair with Minimal Effort and Comfort - Suitable for Long or Short Hair
feature_bullets: Brush head size: 3 3/4 inches (95 mm) wide - For SMALL to MEDIUM pet breeds - PERFECT for both your long haired or short haired cats/dogs/puppies - The pet slicker brush EFFECTIVELY remove mats, tangles, dirt, and loose fur from your pet’s coats with MINIMAL effort
Your DOGS and CATS will LOVE this pet grooming tool. It is made with your pet’s comfort and enjoyment in mind for a FUN and ENJOYABLE pet grooming experience.
TAKES ONLY ABOUT 5 SECONDS TO CLEAN due to the slicker brushes CLEVER SELF CLEANING feature. Simply push the button, wipe, and the brush will be as good as new.
Provides EXCELLENT pet grooming results for DOGS and CATS. Gentle on your pet’s skin and coat it features soft and flexible bristles for EASY AND EFFECTIVE brushing.
HIGHLY RECOMMENDED by pet owners, vets, and professional groomers. It comes with a FREE dog grooming ebook and a LIFETIME FULL MONEY BACK MANUFACTURER GUARANTEE
